contents:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
Case remanded to Court of Common Pleas of 44th Judicial District, Wyoming County Branch, to consider impact of Act of June 2, 1988, P.L. 452, No. 74, 35 P.S. § 4501. Jurisdiction relinquished.
McDERMOTT, J., did not participate in the consideration or decision of this case.
LARSEN and PAPADAKOS, JJ., dissent and would affirm the Order of the Superior Court.
